metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0686 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key in NPM url-parse prior to1.5.8.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0686` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.4.7-3ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-3ubuntu0.1').
